channel.title: Quest tab help!
channel.description:
Well i have a small issue. I'm trying to move something from one file to another.
So i'm trying to move something that was in client.java to playerassistance.java, It would make it so in the quest tab it say "Slayer task kills and stuff like that" But i'm have an issue.
Pics : Code http://gyazo.com/9349da47edb4265fd01ec0b3508468bd
Compile error. http://gyazo.com/b4d5d34cb1e7e738f0e731f19c748dec
I'f you want to help please reply here or add me on skype ! Skype: GooniesHF

item.title: Quest tab help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“TheoLAlex, post:4, topic:547549”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=666455.msg4455734#msg4455734 date=1414759571]

try this

getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Current Slayer Task", 7338);
getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Amount Remaining", 7346);
getPA().sendFrame126(" @yel@"+taskAmount+" ", 7341);

Client.java

That’s not even related to his error.

The error is because “npcHandler” doesn’t exist.
Change it to Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(
[/quote]

mmk Don’t get your knickers in the twist…
was only trying.[/quote]
And I pointed both you and him in the right direction, did I not?

Read full topic
